name: This Is the Bastard
description:
Created in 5 days for Fam Jam 5

Hold out for three days as the deputy Head of the Guild!
Upgrade units, complete quests, buy in the store, enjoy the atmosphere!

  • 13 units!
  • 13 items!
  • 27 quests!
  • Over 900 sec fun!

Control and features:

LMB — drag and drop the card
Space — pause
Esc — menu
